title: Tammy’s Tiny Tea Time
resume:
A maladjusted 42-year-old woman with the emotional capacity of a child shrinks herself  to the size of her toys and forces them to entertain her before introducing several unrelated animated shorts.
In each episode, the gang enjoys a lively chat, game, or orgy, and then it’s time for Tammy’s Toonz, which consists of several animated short films by various artists. They’re dark, bizarre, and unforgivably crude, and they have absolutely nothing to do with the main storyline.
